alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 2:51AM CDT until May 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR WEST CENTRAL MINNESOTA... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Red Flag Warning for west central Minnesota, which is in effect from noon today to 9 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone. * WINDS...Southeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
